channel.title: PnP on kolislab
channel.description: Recent content in PnP on kolislab

item.title: Office365-CLI in a Nano Server Container
item.description: I’m in general interested in everything OfficeDevPnP but I’m not a developer. I like to think that I’m a Hacker, the old school “do something which wasn’t designed” type of hacker. These days I’m experimenting with Docker and I wanted to play with the Office365-CLI and I thought why not run it from a Docker container. And maybe, just to make it more interesting run it from a Nano Server.
